ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class responsible for all Database access and handling. Database access and handling are done via the SQLiteOpenHelper class.
    Since:
    2.1beta
    Version:
    2.2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

      • getAlarm

        public Alarm getAlarm(int id)
               throws android.database.CursorIndexOutOfBoundsException
        To get a row from the database with the given id as an Alarm object.
        Parameters:
        id - Find and return the Alarm object with this id given as int
        Returns:
        Alarm object
        Throws:
        android.database.CursorIndexOutOfBoundsException - If no row with the given id is found in the database
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Alarm

      • getAllAlarm

        public java.util.List<Alarm> getAllAlarm()
        To get all Alarm entries in database as a List of Alarm objects. An empty list will be returned if no entries are found in database.
        Returns:
        All entries in database as a List of Alarm objects
        See Also:
